headline: CHIPOTLE AIMS TO HIRE FUTURE BILLION DOLLAR BUSINESS LEADERS IN NEW 'BURRITO SEASON' HIRING PUSH
summary: Chipotle is looking to hire 20,000 additional employees for its upcoming 'Burrito Season,' the company's busiest time of the year running from March to May.Crew members at Chipotle can advance to a...

headline: Billionaire Bill Ackman Sold 40% of Pershing Square's Stake in Chipotle Mexican Grill and Is Piling Into a Beloved Consumer Brand That's Risen 67,200% Since Its IPO
summary: One of Wall Street's most-famous activist investors continues to pare back his fund's core position in Chipotle, while rapidly building up his stake in a beaten-down retailer.
